## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:**	[Solyc12g089240](https://solgenomics.net/locus/Solyc12g089240/view)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>SlBBX21</u>
- **Gene Name:** B-BOX (BBX) transcription factor 21
- **Genome:** [Tomato Genome version SL4.0](https://solgenomics.net/organism/solanum_lycopersicum/genome)
- **Species:** *Solanum lycopersicum*

## Functional Descriptions:
   - Report that the tomato B-BOX (BBX) transcription factors SlBBX20 and **SlBBX21** interact with SlHY5 and bind to the SlHY5 promoter to activate its transcription.
   - UV-B-induced SlHY5 expression and SlHY5-controlled UV-B responses are normal in slbbx20 and **SlBBX21** single mutants, but strongly compromised in the slbbx20 **SlBBX21** double mutant.
   - Activation and negative feedback regulation of SlHY5 transcription by the SlBBX20/**SlBBX21**â€“SlHY5 transcription factor module in UV-B signaling.
